markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Wasp Swarm](/Monsters.aspx?ID=3234)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Wasp nests are made of chewed wood fibers foraged from the surrounding flora, which the wasps make into a material similar to paper. A single wasp nest can house thousands of individuals that emerge as a massive swarm. Most swarms attack only to protect their nest or if otherwise agitated, though druids and other primal enchanters can bend these venomous vermin to their will—to deadly effect.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Animal](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=43)): DC 19

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 17

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 14
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 4">[Wasp Swarm](/Monsters.aspx?ID=3234)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Large" />
<trait label="Animal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=531" />
<trait label="Swarm" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=707" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Monster Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=221) pg. 343 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Perception** +10; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=59)

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +12

<row gap="medium">
**Str** -4

**Dex** +4

**Con** +2

**Int** -5

**Wis** +2

**Cha** -1
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 18 

**Fort** +10 

**Ref** +12 

**Will** +8 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**HP** 45

</row>

**Immunities**
[grabbed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=77), precision, [prone](/Conditions.aspx?ID=88), [restrained](/Conditions.aspx?ID=90), [swarm mind](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=78)

**Resistances**
bludgeoning 7, piercing 7, slashing 3

**Weaknesses**
area damage 5, [splash](/Traits.aspx?ID=699) damage 5

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 20 feet, fly 40 feet

**Swarming Stings** <actions string="Single Action" />  Each enemy in the swarm's space takes 2d8 piercing damage (DC 21 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex save). A creature that fails its save is also exposed to wasp venom.

**Wasp Venom**  ([Poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126)) **Saving Throw** DC 21 Fortitude; **Maximum Duration** 6 rounds;

**Stage 1** 1d6 poison   **Stage 2** 2d6 poison and [clumsy 2](/Conditions.aspx?ID=61) (2 rounds)

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-483" />
name: Wasp Swarm
